name: Warlike Mech
description:
[FIRST PUBLIC ALPHA RELEASED]

The first project by G.R.A.I.N Studios, very much work in progress!
A metroidvania set in a post-apocalyptic world. The final game would be fully open world with optional lore hidden across the map, but right now we are focusing more on level design and abilities.

>>> GIVE US FEEDBACK <<< Background:

On planet Hyperion, mad scientist Cyrus has discovered the existence of aliens. He kept the secret from everyone except his best friend, Joe. Joe decided to go explore space to attempt to find where the aliens are, while Cyrus remains on Hyperion trying to get in contact with the Aliens. Few months into Joe's journey, Cyrus has made the discovery that there are four main alien tribes on the planet Gasland. Water, Earth, Fire, Air. Cyrus sent an invitation to the four tribes, hoping to meet them on Hyperion, and when the aliens accepted, a message was sent to Joe to call them back to Hyperion.
